name: summitto
goal: We are building the worldâ€™s first blockchain based, real-time, decentralised, and most importantly confidential triple entry accounting system. The registration of accounting entries in an external ledger allows for many applications and improvements in compliance. For the first time, Missing Trader Intra Community Fraud can be eliminated without collecting excessive taxpayer data. Only by focusing on privacy from the start and by maintaining a privacy-by-design philosophy can we create an encrypted and truly safe system.
